+import {InputOtp} from "@nextui-org/react";

+  otp: string;
+}
+

+    },

+    alert(JSON.stringify(data));

+            {...field}
+            errorMessage={errors.otp?.message}
+            isInvalid={!!errors.otp}

+            value: 4,
+            message: "Please enter a valid OTP",
+          },
+        }}

+      <Button className="max-w-fit" type="submit" variant="flat">
+        Verify OTP
+      </Button>
